'Fantastic Beasts 3' Bakal Syuting di Brasil pada 2020
05 Nov 2019, 10:54 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Setelah sempat mengalami beberapa kali revisi jadwal, 'Fantastic Beasts 3' dipastikan bakal memulai syuting pada 2020. (dok. Warner Bros Pictures via imdb.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Film Fantastic Beasts 3 akhirnya memastikan jadwal syuting baru setelah sempat tertunda dua kali. Syuting akan dilakukan pada musim semi 2020 yang berlangsung selama bulan Maret sampai Mei di Brasil.Melansir Variety, kabar tersebut disampaikan oleh Warner Bros. selaku rumah produksi. Sebelumnya proses pengambilan gambar Fantastic Beasts 3 yang direncanakan pada akhir 2018 diundur ke pertengahan 2019. Kemudian, jadwal itu kembali diundur.Kemungkinan besar lokasi syuting dipilih di Brasil karena berkaitan dengan alur cerita. Seperti dalam film Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald (2018) yang berlatar tempat di Prancis.Meski begitu, belum keterangan lebih lanjut tentang cerita Fantastic Beasts 3. Banyak penggemar yang menanti film mendatang ini karena Fantastic Beasts 2 memiliki akhir yang 'menggantung'.Fantastic Beasts menjadi seri film yang menjanjikan lantaran kisahnya terkoneksi dengan film Harry Potter. Dari segi waktu, Fantastic Beasts berlatar waktu puluhan tahun sebelum cerita petualangan Harry Potter.Sejak awal, Warner Bros. telah berencana membuat lima seri film Fantastic Beasts. Namun hal itu masih bisa berubah karena pendapatan yang diperoleh dari Fantastic Beasts 3 tak sesuai ekspektasi. Film pertama bertajuk Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (2016) yang berbujet USD180 juta berhasil meraup pendapatan USD814 juta. Film kedua Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald yang berbujet USD200 juta mendapat untung USD653 juta.


Johnny Depp sebagai Gellert Grindelwald (kiri) belum dipastikan tampil di 'Fantastic Beasts 3' mendatang. (dok. Warner Bros Pictures via imdb.com)

Selain itu, aktor Johnny Depp yang berperan sebagai Gellert Grindelwald dalam seri film Fantastic Beasts belum tentu bakal kembali tampil di seri ketiga mendatang. Melansir The Blast, sumber dekat Depp mengatakan Warner Bros. belum mendekati aktor berusia 55 tahun itu untuk membahas kontrak Fantastic Beasts 3. Depp sebenarnya memiliki kontrak jangka panjang untuk lima film waralaba Fantastic Beasts. Namun dalam setiap film kontrak itu diatur oleh rumah produksi, dalam hal ini Warner Bros. (adp/rea)

'Fantastic Beasts 3' Will be Filming in Brazil in 2020
05 Nov 2019, 10:54 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


After undergoing several schedule revisions, 'Fantastic Beasts 3' is certain to start shooting in 2020. (doc. Warner Bros Pictures via imdb.com)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Fantastic Beasts 3 film finally confirmed the new shooting schedule after being delayed twice. Filming will take place in the spring of 2020 which runs from March to May in Brazil. Launching Variety, the news was delivered by Warner Bros. as a production house. Previously the process of shooting Fantastic Beasts 3 planned at the end of 2018 was postponed to the middle of 2019. Then, the schedule was postponed again. Most likely the shooting location was chosen in Brazil because it was related to the storyline. Like in the movie Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald (2018) set in France. Even so, there is no further information about the story of Fantastic Beasts 3. Many fans are waiting for this upcoming movie because Fantastic Beasts 2 has a 'hanging' end. Fantastic Beasts became a promising film series because the story is connected to the Harry Potter films. In terms of time, Fantastic Beasts set decades before the Harry Potter adventure story. Since the beginning, Warner Bros. has planned to make five Fantastic Beasts. But that can still change because the income earned from Fantastic Beasts 3 does not match expectations. The first film titled Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (2016) with a budget of USD 180 million succeeded in gaining revenue of USD 814 million. The second film Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald which has a budget of USD200 million gets a profit of USD653 million.


Johnny Depp as Gellert Grindelwald (left) has not yet been confirmed to appear in the upcoming 'Fantastic Beasts 3'. (doc. Warner Bros Pictures via imdb.com)

In addition, the actor Johnny Depp, who plays Gellert Grindelwald in the Fantastic Beasts film series, will not necessarily be back in the upcoming third series. Launch The Blast, a source close to Depp said Warner Bros. not yet approached the 55-year-old actor to discuss the contract Fantastic Beasts 3. Depp actually has a long-term contract for five Fantastic Beasts franchise films. But in every film the contract is regulated by the production house, in this case Warner Bros. (adp / rea)
